org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver

类 TestHRegionServerBulkLoad

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.TestHRegionServerBulkLoad
  • 直接已知子类:
    TestHRegionServerBulkLoadWithOldClient, TestHRegionServerBulkLoadWithOldSecureEndpoint

    public class TestHRegionServerBulkLoad
extends Object
    Tests bulk loading of HFiles and shows the atomicity or lack of atomicity of the region server's bullkLoad functionality.
